roleset.name: to speak or utter in a certain way
roleset.note: PRONOUNCE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'pronounce' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from pronounce.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: Mr. Warren pronounces the Litchfield case `` your typical demonic infestation . ''
example.arg: the Litchfield case `` your typical demonic infestation

example.name: with Arg2
example.text: The demise of Merkur-1 ( pronounced [*]-1 mare-COOR ) comes after a September in which 670 Merkur dealers managed [*-1]to sell only 93 Scorpios [*T*-2] .

roleset.name: marked, noticeable
roleset.note: PRONOUNCED-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on Medi-seed corpus. (from pronounced.01-j)

example.name: arg1
example.text: Multifocal segmental high grade narrowing involving both common iliac and external iliac arteries which-1 [*-1] is more pronounced in the external iliac arteries .
